set-variable.doc:name: query expected records
set-variable.value: #["SELECT count(*) total from Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe WHERE ValidFrom > :validFrom" ]

set-variable.doc:name: query expected records with custom watermark
set-variable.value: #['SELECT count(*) total from Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe WHERE ValidFrom between :start and :end' ]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: #[ %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- " SELECT " ++ " UPPER(RTRIM(CustomerAccountNumber_Key)) as CustomerAccountNumber_Key, " ++ " RTRIM(Agency_Code) as Agency_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(AgencyName) as AgencyName, " ++ " RTRIM(Region_Code) as Region_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(RegionName) as RegionName, " ++ " RTRIM(Tribe_Code) as Tribe_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(TribeName) as TribeName, " ++ " FORMAT(ValidFrom, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ') AS ValidFrom " ++ " FROM Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe " ++ " WHERE " ++ ( if (isEmpty(vars.customWatermarkStart)) " ValidFrom > :validFrom " else " ValidFrom between :start and :end " ) ++ " ORDER BY ValidFrom, CustomerAccountNumber_Key " ++ " OFFSET " ++ (vars.offset as String) ++ " ROWS " ++ " FETCH NEXT " ++ (vars.maxRecords as String) ++ " ROWS ONLY" ]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- payload map (item, value) ->{ account: item.CustomerAccountNumber_Key, (agencyCode: item.Agency_Code) if (!isEmpty(item.Agency_Code)), (agencyDescription: item.AgencyName) if (!isEmpty(item.AgencyName)), (regionCode: item.Region_Code) if (!isEmpty(item.Region_Code)), (regionDescription: item.RegionName) if (!isEmpty(item.RegionName)), (tribeCode: item.Tribe_Code as String) if (!isEmpty(item.Tribe_Code)), (tribeDescription: item.TribeName) if (!isEmpty(item.TribeName)), date: trim(item.ValidFrom) }
